Definition: A bet or stake on an uncertain outcome
Staking money on uncertain events for entertainment or profit
To play games of chance for money
The ratio of probabilities in betting
Money received when winning a bet
The act of placing money at risk
Most likely winner with low odds
Betting on a margin of victory
Pool betting system from horse racing
Program to ban oneself from gambling
Risky investment or informed analysis depending on context
Combining dispersed information through market mechanism
Process by which markets determine prices
Theory that markets reflect all available information
Market that quickly incorporates new information
Financial instrument based on underlying asset
Agreement to transact at future date

Source: Snowberg et al. (2012), Dreber et al.

Definition: Person who trades (neutral term vs gambler)
Good or service that can be traded
